canonical_explanation.text: Plants are living things that grow around us. A plant has different parts: root, stem, leaf, flower, and fruit. There are different types of plants like trees, shrubs, herbs, creepers, and climbers. Plants give us many things like food, medicine, shade, and fresh air. We should take care of plants by watering them and giving them sunlight.
rules: A plant has root, stem, leaf, flower, and fruit.
Trees are big and tall, shrubs are smaller, herbs are very small.
Creepers grow along the ground, climbers climb up.
Plants give us food, medicine, wood, shade, and oxygen.
We should water plants and give them sunlight.

questions.question_text: Which part of the plant is under the ground?
questions.explanation_correct: The root of the plant is the part that is under the ground. Roots help the plant grow by taking water and nutrients from the soil.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The leaf, flower, and stem of the plant are found above the ground. The root is the part that is found under the ground and helps the plant get the water and food it needs from the soil.

questions.question_text: Which part of the plant holds it up?
questions.explanation_correct: The stem of a plant holds it up and keeps it standing tall. The stem is like a strong support that the plant needs to grow and stay upright.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The root of a plant is important, but it does not hold the plant up. The root grows under the ground and helps the plant get water and nutrients. The stem is the part of the plant that holds it up and keeps it standing straight.

questions.question_text: What color are most leaves?
questions.explanation_correct: Most leaves are green in color because they contain a special green substance called chlorophyll. Chlorophyll helps the plant make its own food using sunlight, water, and air.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The leaves of most plants are not red, blue, or yellow. They are green because of a substance called chlorophyll that the plant uses to make its own food. The green color helps the plant absorb sunlight, which is very important for its growth and survival.

questions.question_text: Which part of the plant is colorful and beautiful?
questions.explanation_correct: The flower is the most colorful and beautiful part of a plant. Flowers come in many different colors and shapes to attract insects and birds that can help pollinate the plant.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The root, stem, and leaf are not as colorful and beautiful as the flower. The flower is the part of the plant that has the bright petals and other colorful structures that make it look so nice. The flower helps the plant grow its fruit and seeds.

questions.question_text: Which part of the plant has seeds inside?
questions.explanation_correct: The fruit of a plant has seeds inside it. Seeds are very important because they can grow into new plants. So, the fruit is the part of the plant that has seeds.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The root, stem, and leaf do not have seeds inside them. Only the fruit of the plant has seeds. The seeds inside the fruit can grow into new plants when they are planted in the soil.

questions.question_text: Which of these is a tree?
questions.explanation_correct: Mango is a tree because it has a tall, thick stem or trunk with branches and leaves. Trees are the largest type of plants and can grow very tall.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The rose, tulsi, and pumpkin are not trees. The rose and tulsi are herbs, which are small plants with soft stems. The pumpkin is a vine or creeper, which is a plant that grows along the ground or climbs up other things. Trees are the biggest type of plant with a thick, tall stem or trunk.

questions.question_text: Trees are ___ than shrubs.
questions.explanation_correct: Trees are taller than shrubs. This is because trees have a tall, thick stem or trunk that can grow very high, while shrubs have shorter, branching stems that do not grow as tall.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Trees are not smaller or shorter than shrubs. Trees are actually much taller and bigger than shrubs. The main difference is that trees have a tall, thick stem or trunk that can grow very high, while shrubs have shorter, branching stems that do not grow as tall.

questions.question_text: Which plant is very small and soft?
questions.explanation_correct: The tulsi herb is very small and soft compared to the other plants. It is an example of a small and soft plant, so the correct answer is C.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The mango tree, rose shrub, and banyan tree are all larger and harder plants. They are not small and soft like the tulsi herb. The tulsi herb is the only plant in the options that is very small and soft, which is why C is the correct answer.

questions.question_text: Which plant grows along the ground?
questions.explanation_correct: A creeper is a type of plant that grows along the ground. It has long, thin stems that spread out and cover the ground, so the correct answer is B) Creeper.
questions.explanation_incorrect: A tree is a large plant with a thick stem and branches, so it does not grow along the ground. A shrub is a small, bushy plant, and an herb is a small plant with soft, green stems, so they also do not grow along the ground like a creeper does. The correct answer is B) Creeper.

questions.question_text: Money plant climbs up walls. What type of plant is it?
questions.explanation_correct: The money plant is a Climber because it uses its stems to climb up walls and other structures. Climbers have special parts that help them attach to and grow up tall things like walls and trees.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The money plant is not a Tree, Shrub, or Creeper. Trees have a thick, woody trunk, shrubs are small, bushy plants, and creepers grow along the ground. The money plant is a Climber because it uses its stems to climb up walls and other structures.

questions.question_text: Which of these do we get from plants?
questions.explanation_correct: Plants give us many things, including fruits and vegetables. Fruits like apples, oranges, and bananas, and vegetables like carrots, tomatoes, and spinach all come from plants. These are good for us to eat and help us stay healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: While milk comes from cows, eggs come from chickens, and meat comes from animals, these things do not come from plants. Plants give us things like fruits, vegetables, and other foods that are good for us to eat.

questions.question_text: What do plants give us on a hot day?
questions.explanation_correct: Plants give us shade on a hot day. The leaves and branches of plants block the sun's rays, making it cooler and more comfortable under the plant.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Plants do not give us fire, cold water, or ice cream on a hot day. Plants provide shade by blocking the sun's rays with their leaves and branches. This helps keep the area under the plant cooler and more comfortable on a hot day.

questions.question_text: We make furniture from wood. Where does wood come from?
questions.explanation_correct: Trees are plants that have a thick, woody stem called a trunk. When we cut down a tree, we get wood from its trunk. That's why we make furniture from wood - it comes from trees, which are plants.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Wood does not come from animals, water, or stones. It comes from the trunks of trees, which are plants that grow around us. Trees have a thick, woody stem that we can use to make furniture and other things.

questions.question_text: What do plants need to grow?
questions.explanation_correct: Plants need water and sunlight to grow. Water helps the plant drink and the sunlight helps the plant make its own food. This is why option A is the correct answer.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Plants do not need toys, books, or music to grow. They need water to drink and sunlight to make their food. Toys, books, and music are for people, not plants.

questions.question_text: Your plant is looking dry. What should you do?
questions.explanation_correct: If your plant is looking dry, you should water it. Plants need water to grow and stay healthy. Watering your plant will help it get the water it needs.
questions.explanation_incorrect: You should not put your plant in the dark, throw it away, or do nothing. Plants need sunlight and water to live and grow. Watering your plant is the best thing to do if it is looking dry.

questions.question_text: Which part of the plant takes water from the soil?
questions.explanation_correct: The root of the plant takes water from the soil. The root is the part of the plant that grows underground and helps the plant get the water and nutrients it needs to grow.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The leaf, flower, and fruit of the plant do not take water from the soil. Those parts of the plant use the water that the root brings up from the soil, but the root is the part that actually takes the water from the ground and brings it up to the rest of the plant.

questions.question_text: Plants give us fresh ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Plants give us fresh air because they take in carbon dioxide and release oxygen, which we need to breathe. This helps to clean the air around us and make it nice and fresh.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Plants do not give us clothes. Clothes are made from materials like cotton, wool, or leather, which come from other sources. Plants give us many useful things like food, medicine, and fresh air to breathe, but not clothes.

questions.question_text: Pumpkin plant spreads along the ground. It is a ___.
questions.explanation_correct: The pumpkin plant is a creeper because it spreads along the ground instead of growing upright. Creepers are plants that crawl along the ground and use their stems to support themselves.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The pumpkin plant is not a tree, shrub, or herb. Trees have a tall, woody stem and grow upright. Shrubs are bushy plants with many stems. Herbs are small plants with soft stems. The pumpkin plant is a creeper because it spreads along the ground with its long, flexible stems.

questions.question_text: Mango and apple are ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Mango and apple are fruits because they grow on the plant, not on the roots, stems, or flowers. Fruits are the sweet or juicy parts of the plant that we can eat.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Mango and apple are not roots, stems, or flowers. They are fruits, which are the edible parts of the plant that grow from the flower. Fruits contain seeds and are used for reproduction, as well as to provide food for us.

questions.question_text: Rose and sunflower are ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Rose and sunflower are flowers. Flowers are the colorful, beautiful parts of the plant that bloom and grow fruits or seeds.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Rose and sunflower are not roots, fruits, or stems. Roots are the parts of the plant that grow underground and suck up water and nutrients from the soil. Stems are the main parts that hold up the plant and its leaves, flowers, and fruits. Fruits are the sweet, juicy parts of the plant that contain seeds.

questions.question_text: What should we NOT do to plants?
questions.explanation_correct: We should not pluck leaves from plants for no reason because leaves are important for the plant. Leaves help the plant make its own food and grow bigger and stronger. Plucking leaves can hurt the plant and stop it from growing well.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Plants need water and sunlight to grow and be healthy. We should always water them and make sure they get enough sunlight. But we should not pluck their leaves for no reason. Leaves are important for the plant, and taking them away can make the plant sick.

questions.question_text: Which medicine comes from plants?
questions.explanation_correct: The answer is A) Tulsi for cough. Tulsi is a type of plant, and it is used to make medicine that helps cure cough and other illnesses. Many medicines we use come from different plants.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The other options are not correct because milk, eggs, and meat do not come from plants. They come from animals. Tulsi is a plant, and it is used to make medicine that can help with cough and other illnesses.

questions.question_text: Banyan and Neem are ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Banyan and Neem are trees because they have a large trunk, branches, and leaves that grow up tall. Trees are the biggest type of plant and can live for many years.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Banyan and Neem are not herbs, shrubs, or creepers. Herbs are small plants with soft stems, shrubs are woody plants with branches close to the ground, and creepers are plants that climb up other things. Banyan and Neem are trees because they have a large trunk, branches, and leaves that grow up tall.

questions.question_text: Rose and hibiscus are ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Rose and hibiscus are shrubs. Shrubs are plants that have woody stems and branches, but they are shorter than trees. They have many stems growing from the base and do not have a single main trunk like trees.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Rose and hibiscus are not trees, herbs, or climbers. Trees are very tall plants with a single thick trunk. Herbs are small plants with soft, green stems. Climbers are plants that use other objects to climb up, but rose and hibiscus do not climb. Instead, they are shrubs, which are medium-sized plants with multiple woody stems.

questions.question_text: We eat carrot and potato. These are ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Carrot and potato are roots of plants. Roots grow underground and store food for the plant. That's why we can eat carrot and potato as food.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Carrot and potato are not leaves, flowers, or stems of plants. They are the roots of the plants. Roots grow under the ground and store food for the plant. We can dig up and eat the roots of some plants like carrot and potato.

questions.question_text: We eat spinach and cabbage. These are ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Spinach and cabbage are leaves of plants, so the correct answer is A. Leaves. We eat the green, leafy parts of these plants.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Spinach and cabbage are not roots, fruits, or flowers of plants. Roots grow underground and provide the plant with water and nutrients. Fruits contain the seeds of a plant. Flowers are the colorful parts that bloom on a plant. Spinach and cabbage are the leaves of the plant, which we use as food.

questions.question_text: How can we help plants grow?
questions.explanation_correct: We can help plants grow by planting more trees. More trees mean more plants, and more plants are good for the environment. Plants give us oxygen and make the air we breathe fresh and clean.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We should not cut down all the trees because trees are important for the environment. Trees give us shade, food, and fresh air to breathe. Keeping plants in the dark will not help them grow, as plants need sunlight to make their own food. We should water plants regularly to help them grow healthy and strong.

questions.question_text: A plant needs ___ to make food.
questions.explanation_correct: Plants need sunlight to make their own food. They use the energy from sunlight, along with water and air, to make their food through a process called photosynthesis. This is how plants get the nutrients they need to grow and stay healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Plants do not need darkness, cold, or night to make their food. They need sunlight to make their own food through photosynthesis. Sunlight provides the energy the plant needs to turn water and air into the nutrients it requires to grow and thrive.

questions.question_text: Grape vine climbs up a support. It is a ___.
questions.explanation_correct: The grape vine is a climber, which means it uses its vines to climb up a support like a tree or wall. Climbers have stems that can't stand up on their own, so they need to latch onto something to grow tall.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The grape vine is not a tree, shrub, or herb. Trees have thick, woody stems that can stand on their own. Shrubs are smaller plants with multiple stems. Herbs are small plants with soft, green stems. The grape vine is a climber that uses its vines to climb up a support to grow tall.

questions.question_text: Plants are called green friends because they ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Plants are called green friends because they help us live. Plants give us food, medicine, and clean air to breathe. They are important for our lives, so we call them our green friends.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is that plants are called green friends because they help us live. They give us many important things like food, medicine, and clean air. Plants are not always green, and they are not toys to play with. They are living things that we need to take care of.

questions.question_text: Roots are under the ground.
questions.explanation_correct: The roots of a plant are under the ground. Roots help the plant to stay in the soil and soak up water and nutrients from the soil.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The roots of a plant are not on top of the ground. They are under the soil, in the ground. Roots help the plant grow and get the things it needs from the soil, like water and food.

questions.question_text: Leaves are usually green in color.
questions.explanation_correct: Leaves are usually green in color because they contain a green substance called chlorophyll. Chlorophyll helps the plant make its own food through a process called photosynthesis.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Some plants may have leaves that are not green, like red, purple, or yellow leaves. But most plants have green leaves because the green chlorophyll helps them make food from sunlight, water, and air. So the statement that leaves are usually green is correct.

questions.question_text: Trees are smaller than herbs.
questions.explanation_correct: Trees are usually much taller and bigger than herbs. Trees have a strong, thick stem called a trunk, while herbs have a soft, short stem. So the statement 'Trees are smaller than herbs' is false.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Many people may think that trees are smaller than herbs because some herbs can be taller than small trees. However, in general, trees are much larger and taller than herbs. Trees have a thick, woody trunk and can grow very tall, while herbs have a soft, short stem and are usually shorter.

questions.question_text: Creepers grow along the ground.
questions.explanation_correct: Creepers are a type of plant that grow along the ground. They have long, thin stems that spread out along the surface of the soil and can climb up other objects like walls or fences.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Some plants like trees and shrubs grow upright, but creepers do not. Creepers have long, thin stems that spread out along the ground instead of growing straight up. This allows them to climb and cover the ground around them.

questions.question_text: Plants give us fruits and vegetables.
questions.explanation_correct: Plants give us many things, including fruits and vegetables. Fruits and vegetables are part of the plant that we can eat and they are very good for our health.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Some plants do not give us fruits or vegetables. For example, trees like oak and pine do not have fruits or vegetables that we can eat. But most plants that grow around us, like fruits trees and vegetable plants, do give us fruits and vegetables that are good for us to eat.

questions.question_text: Plants do not need water to grow.
questions.explanation_correct: Plants need water to grow. Water helps plants make their own food and stay healthy. Without water, plants would not be able to survive.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Plants do need water to grow. Water is very important for plants. It helps them make their own food and stay alive. If plants don't get enough water, they will start to wither and die.

questions.question_text: We get wood from trees.
questions.explanation_correct: Yes, the answer is true. We get wood from trees. Trees are a type of plant that have a thick, woody stem called a trunk. We can cut down the trunk and use the wood to make things like furniture, houses, and paper.
questions.explanation_incorrect: No, the answer is not false. We do get wood from trees. Trees are plants that have a thick, woody stem called a trunk. The wood from the trunk can be used to make many things. If the answer was false, it would mean that we don't get wood from trees, which is not correct.

questions.question_text: Flowers are always found under the ground.
questions.explanation_correct: Flowers are not found under the ground. Flowers grow on the plant, usually on the stem or branches above the ground. They are not hidden under the soil.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Flowers are not always found under the ground. Flowers grow on the plant, usually on the stem or branches above the ground. They need sunlight and air to grow, so they cannot be hidden under the soil.

questions.question_text: We should plant more trees.
questions.explanation_correct: We should plant more trees because trees give us many good things. They give us fresh air to breathe, shade to keep us cool, and fruits and flowers that we can enjoy. Planting more trees is good for the environment and helps make our world a better place to live.
questions.explanation_incorrect: It is not true that we should not plant more trees. Trees are very important for our environment and our health. We should try to plant more trees whenever we can, because they give us so many benefits like fresh air, shade, and food. Planting more trees is the right thing to do.

questions.question_text: Money plant is a climber.
questions.explanation_correct: The money plant is a climber because it has long, trailing stems that can climb up and attach to surfaces like walls or trellises. Climbers are a type of plant that need support to grow tall and spread out.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The money plant is not a shrub or a tree, which are other types of plants. It is a climber because it has long, trailing stems that can climb up and attach to surfaces. Climbers are different from other plants because they need support to grow tall and spread out.

questions.question_text: The ___ of a plant is under the ground.
questions.explanation_correct: The root of a plant is under the ground. The root helps the plant get water and nutrients from the soil to grow and stay strong.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The stem of a plant is not under the ground, it is above the ground. The root is the part of the plant that is under the ground. The root helps the plant get water and nutrients to grow.

questions.question_text: The ___ holds the plant up.
questions.explanation_correct: The stem is the part of the plant that holds it up and helps it stand tall. It connects the roots to the leaves, flowers, and fruits of the plant.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The root is not the correct answer. The root is the part that grows underground and helps the plant get water and nutrients from the soil. The stem is the part that holds the plant up and keeps it standing. The correct answer is 'stem'.

questions.question_text: Leaves are usually ___ in color.
questions.explanation_correct: Leaves are usually green in color because they contain a special substance called chlorophyll. Chlorophyll helps the leaves absorb sunlight and make food for the plant.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'green'. Leaves are usually green because they contain a special substance called chlorophyll. Chlorophyll gives the leaves their green color and helps the plant make its own food. Other colors like red, yellow, or brown are not the usual color of leaves.

questions.question_text: Mango and banyan are ___ (big plants).
questions.explanation_correct: Mango and banyan are trees because they are big plants that have a strong wooden trunk, branches, and leaves. Trees are one of the largest types of plants that grow around us.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Mango and banyan are not 'big plants', they are actually 'trees'. Trees are a type of big plant that have a thick, woody stem called a trunk. They grow very tall and have many branches with leaves. The correct answer to fill in the blank is 'trees'.

questions.question_text: Tulsi and mint are ___ (very small plants).
questions.explanation_correct: Tulsi and mint are called 'herbs' because they are very small plants that grow close to the ground. Herbs have soft, green stems and leaves that we can use for food and medicine.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Tulsi and mint are not 'very small plants', they are actually 'herbs'. Herbs are a type of plant that are small, have soft stems and leaves, and are often used for cooking or medicine. The correct answer is 'herbs'.

questions.question_text: Plants give us ___ and vegetables.
questions.explanation_correct: Plants give us fruits and vegetables because many plants produce fruits and vegetables that we can eat. Fruits and vegetables are important parts of plants that provide us with healthy and nutritious food.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'fruits'. Plants give us fruits, such as apples, oranges, and bananas, which are healthy and delicious. They also give us vegetables, such as carrots, spinach, and tomatoes, which are also very good for us. So the answer 'fruits' is correct because plants provide us with both fruits and vegetables.

questions.question_text: Plants need ___ and sunlight to grow.
questions.explanation_correct: Plants need water to grow because they use water to make their food. Water helps the plant stay strong and healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'water'. Plants need water to grow because they use it to make their food. They also need sunlight, but water is the most important thing for a plant to grow. If you don't give a plant water, it will not be able to live and grow.

questions.question_text: Trees give us ___ on a hot day.
questions.explanation_correct: Trees give us shade on a hot day because their leaves and branches block the sun's rays, making the area under the tree cooler and more comfortable.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'shade'. Trees have many leaves and branches that spread out and cover a large area. When you stand under a tree on a hot day, the leaves and branches block the sun's rays, making the area under the tree feel cooler and shaded. This shade from the tree is very helpful on a hot day.

questions.question_text: Apple and mango are ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Apple and mango are fruits because they grow on plants and we can eat them. Fruits are part of the plant that contains the seeds.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Apple and mango are not trees or flowers. They are fruits, which are the part of the plant that we can eat. Fruits grow on plants and have seeds inside them.

questions.question_text: Rose and sunflower are ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Rose and sunflower are flowers because they have petals and grow from the stem of the plant. Flowers are one of the main parts of a plant, along with roots, stem, leaves, and fruits.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Rose and sunflower are not trees, shrubs, herbs, creepers, or climbers. They are flowers, which are a type of plant that has petals and grows from the stem. The correct answer is 'flowers' because rose and sunflower are flowering plants.

questions.question_text: Pumpkin is a ___ because it grows along the ground.
questions.explanation_correct: Pumpkin is a creeper because it grows along the ground and sends out long vines that spread out. Creepers are a type of plant that grow close to the ground and use their vines to climb or spread out.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Pumpkin is not a tree, shrub, herb, or climber. It is a creeper, which means it grows along the ground and sends out long vines that spread out. The correct answer to fill in the blank is 'creeper'.

questions.question_text: Furniture is made from ___ that comes from trees.
questions.explanation_correct: Furniture is made from wood that comes from trees. Wood is a strong and durable material that can be used to make all kinds of furniture like tables, chairs, and beds.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Furniture is not made from leaves or flowers. Furniture is made from wood, which comes from the trunks and branches of trees. The correct answer is 'wood'.

questions.question_text: Put the parts of plant in order from bottom to top.
questions.explanation_correct: The root is at the bottom of the plant, the stem grows up from the root, and the leaves grow from the stem. This is the correct order of the plant parts from bottom to top.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The order of the plant parts from bottom to top is root, stem, and then leaf. The root grows in the ground and brings water and nutrients to the plant. The stem grows up from the root and holds up the leaves. The leaves grow from the stem and use sunlight to make food for the plant.

questions.question_text: Put these plants in order from smallest to biggest.
questions.explanation_correct: The order from smallest to biggest is Herb, Shrub, Tree. Herbs are small plants, shrubs are medium-sized plants, and trees are the biggest plants. This is the correct order because it shows the plants going from the smallest to the largest size.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The order should be Herb, Shrub, Tree. Herbs are the smallest, like small flowers and plants. Shrubs are medium-sized plants, like bushes. Trees are the biggest plants, with a tall trunk and branches. This is the correct order because it shows the plants going from smallest to largest size.

questions.question_text: Put in order: How a plant grows from seed.
questions.explanation_correct: The correct order is 'Seed in soil', 'Roots grow', and then 'Plant comes up' because this is how a plant grows from a seed. First, the seed is planted in the soil, then the roots start to grow, and finally the plant sprouts up from the ground.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The incorrect order would be 'Plant comes up', 'Roots grow', and 'Seed in soil'. This is not correct because the plant cannot come up before the roots have grown, and the roots cannot grow before the seed is planted in the soil. The correct order is 'Seed in soil', 'Roots grow', and then 'Plant comes up'.

questions.question_text: Put in order: How to water a plant.
questions.explanation_correct: The correct order is 'Get water', 'Pour in pot', 'Plant drinks' because this is the right way to water a plant. First, you need to get the water, then pour it into the plant's pot, and finally the plant will drink the water and grow strong and healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The incorrect order is not right because the plant cannot drink the water until you first get the water and then pour it into the plant's pot. The plant needs the water in its pot to be able to drink it and grow. The correct order is 'Get water', 'Pour in pot', 'Plant drinks'.

questions.question_text: Put in order: From flower to fruit.
questions.explanation_correct: The correct order is 'Flower blooms', 'Flower falls', 'Fruit grows' because this is the natural cycle of how a plant grows. First, the flower blooms, then the flower falls off, and finally, the fruit grows from where the flower used to be.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The wrong order would be 'Flower falls', 'Fruit grows', 'Flower blooms'. This is incorrect because the flower must bloom first before it can fall off, and the fruit can only grow after the flower has fallen off. The correct order is 'Flower blooms', 'Flower falls', 'Fruit grows'.

questions.question_text: How is a tree different from a herb?

options.text: A tree is big and tall, a herb is very small
A tree is small, a herb is big
A herb is taller than a tree

questions.explanation_correct: A tree is big and tall with a thick, hard trunk, while a herb is very small with a soft, thin stem. That is the main difference between a tree and a herb.
questions.explanation_incorrect: A tree is not small and a herb is not big. Trees like mango and neem are very big and tall with thick trunks. Herbs like tulsi and mint are very small plants with soft stems. They are not the same size at all.

questions.question_text: How is a creeper different from a climber?

options.text: A creeper is a tree and a climber is a shrub
A creeper grows along the ground, a climber goes up
A climber grows along the ground, a creeper goes up

questions.explanation_correct: A creeper spreads along the ground, like pumpkin. A climber grows upward by holding onto walls or other supports, like money plant. That is the main difference between them.
questions.explanation_incorrect: A creeper is not a tree and a climber is not a shrub. The real difference is that creepers spread along the ground while climbers go upward using support. Neither of them grows under the ground.

questions.question_text: How is a root different from a stem?

options.text: The root is above the ground and the stem is below
The root is below the ground and the stem is above

questions.explanation_correct: The root grows below the ground in the soil and takes in water. The stem grows above the ground and holds the plant up. That is the main difference between a root and a stem.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The root and stem are in different places. The root is below the ground where it takes in water from the soil. The stem is above the ground where it holds the plant up and carries water to the leaves.

questions.question_text: How is a flower different from a leaf?

options.text: A flower is colorful and makes fruits, a leaf is usually green and makes food
A flower is always green and a leaf is always red
A leaf is colorful and a flower is always green

questions.explanation_correct: A flower is the colorful part of the plant that helps make fruits and seeds. A leaf is usually green and helps the plant make its food using sunlight. They have different jobs in the plant.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Flowers and leaves are not the same. Flowers come in many bright colors and help the plant make fruits. Leaves are usually green and help the plant make food from sunlight. They look different and do different things for the plant.

questions.question_text: How is a shrub different from a tree?

options.text: A shrub has many stems from the base, a tree has one thick trunk
A shrub is taller than a tree
A tree has soft stems and a shrub has a hard trunk

questions.explanation_correct: A shrub like rose has many stems growing from the base and is shorter. A tree like mango has one thick, tall trunk. That is the main difference between a shrub and a tree.
questions.explanation_incorrect: A shrub is not taller than a tree. Trees are much taller and bigger. The key difference is that a shrub has many stems from the base while a tree has one thick trunk. They do not look the same.

questions.question_text: A plant is very tall and has a thick, hard trunk. What type of plant is it?
questions.explanation_correct: A plant that is very tall with a thick, hard trunk is a tree. Trees like mango and neem are the tallest type of plants with strong trunks.
questions.explanation_incorrect: A herb is very small with a soft stem. A shrub is medium sized with many thin stems. A creeper spreads along the ground. Only a tree is very tall with a thick, hard trunk.

questions.question_text: A plant has a soft, thin stem and is very short. What type of plant is it?
questions.explanation_correct: A plant that has a soft, thin stem and is very short is a herb. Herbs like tulsi and mint are small plants with soft stems.
questions.explanation_incorrect: A tree is very tall with a hard trunk, so it does not match. A climber grows upward on supports. A shrub has woody stems. Only a herb is very short with a soft, thin stem.

questions.question_text: A plant has many woody stems growing from the base and is shorter than a tree. What type of plant is it?
questions.explanation_correct: A plant with many woody stems from the base that is shorter than a tree is a shrub. Rose and hibiscus are shrubs. They have many branches from near the ground.
questions.explanation_incorrect: A tree has one thick trunk. A herb has a soft stem and is very small. A creeper spreads along the ground. A plant with many woody stems from the base that is shorter than a tree is a shrub.

questions.question_text: A plant cannot stand on its own and needs a wall to grow up. What type of plant is it?
questions.explanation_correct: A plant that cannot stand on its own and needs a wall or support to grow up is a climber. Money plant and grape vine are climbers that hold onto walls or sticks to grow upward.
questions.explanation_incorrect: A tree can stand on its own with its thick trunk. A herb stands by itself too, though it is small. A shrub also stands on its own. Only a climber needs a wall or support to grow up.

questions.question_text: Riya planted a seed in a pot and kept the pot inside a dark room. The plant did not grow well. Why did this happen?

options.text: The plant did not get sunlight

questions.explanation_correct: Riya kept the pot in a dark room, so the plant did not get sunlight. Plants need sunlight to make their food and grow. Without sunlight, the plant could not grow well.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The size of the pot or the room does not matter here. The important thing is that the plant was in a dark room with no sunlight. Plants need sunlight to grow, so keeping them in the dark will stop them from growing well.

questions.question_text: Amit's grandmother gave him tulsi leaves when he had a cough. What does this tell us about plants?
questions.explanation_correct: Amit's grandmother used tulsi leaves to help his cough. This shows that plants give us medicine. Tulsi is a plant that helps cure cough and cold.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Plants do not give us toys, clothes, or books. In this story, tulsi leaves were used to help Amit's cough. This means plants can be used as medicine to make us feel better when we are sick.

questions.question_text: Priya saw that her plant's leaves were turning yellow and dry. She had not watered it for many days. What should Priya do?

options.text: Put the plant in a dark room

questions.explanation_correct: Priya's plant is dry because she did not water it for many days. Plants need water to stay healthy. She should start watering her plant regularly so it can become green and healthy again.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Throwing the plant away or doing nothing will not help. Putting it in a dark room will make it worse because plants also need sunlight. The plant is dry because it needs water, so Priya should water it regularly.

questions.question_text: Rohan saw a plant in his garden that was spreading along the ground with long thin stems. It had big yellow flowers. What type of plant did Rohan see?
questions.explanation_correct: The plant was spreading along the ground with long thin stems. This is how a creeper grows. Creepers like pumpkin spread along the ground and do not grow upward on their own.
questions.explanation_incorrect: A tree is tall with a thick trunk. A shrub is bushy with many stems from the base. A herb is very small. The plant spreading along the ground with long thin stems is a creeper.

questions.question_text: Meera dug up a carrot from the garden. She saw it was growing under the soil. Which part of the plant is the carrot?
questions.explanation_correct: Meera found the carrot growing under the soil. The part of the plant that grows under the soil is the root. Carrot is a root that we can eat.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Leaves, stems, and flowers all grow above the ground. Since the carrot was growing under the soil, it is a root. Roots grow below the ground and take in water for the plant.

questions.question_text: Which of these is NOT a tree?
questions.explanation_correct: Tulsi is NOT a tree. Tulsi is a small herb with a soft stem. Mango, neem, and banyan are all big trees with thick, hard trunks.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Mango, neem, and banyan are all trees. They are big and tall with hard trunks. Tulsi is the one that is not a tree. It is a small herb with a soft green stem.

questions.question_text: Which of these is NOT a part of a plant?
questions.explanation_correct: A wheel is NOT a part of a plant. A wheel is part of a car or bicycle. Root, stem, and leaf are all real parts of a plant.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Root, stem, and leaf are all parts of a plant. A wheel is not a part of any plant. Wheels are found on vehicles like cars and bicycles, not on plants.

questions.question_text: Which of these do we NOT get from plants?
questions.explanation_correct: Eggs do NOT come from plants. Eggs come from birds like hens. We do get fruits, wood, and medicine from plants.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Fruits grow on plants. Wood comes from trees. Medicine like tulsi comes from plants. But eggs come from hens and other birds, not from plants. So eggs is the correct answer.

questions.question_text: Why do plants need water?

options.text: To change their color to blue

questions.explanation_correct: Plants need water to stay alive and grow. Water helps the plant make its food and keeps it healthy and strong. Without water, a plant will dry up and die.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Plants do not need water to play, change color to blue, or make noise. Water is important for plants because it helps them stay alive. Plants use water to make food and to keep their leaves and stems fresh and healthy.

questions.question_text: Why do plants need sunlight?

options.text: To move from place to place

questions.explanation_correct: Plants need sunlight to make their own food. The leaves of the plant use sunlight along with water and air to prepare food. This is why plants grow best in sunny places.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Plants do not sleep, move around, or talk. They need sunlight because it helps them make their own food. Without sunlight, plants cannot prepare the food they need to grow and stay healthy.

questions.question_text: Why should we not pluck leaves from plants for no reason?

options.text: Because leaves help the plant make food

questions.explanation_correct: We should not pluck leaves because leaves help the plant make food. Without enough leaves, the plant cannot make the food it needs to grow and may become weak or die.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Leaves are not dirty, heavy, or able to bite. The real reason we should not pluck leaves is that they help the plant make its food. If we remove too many leaves, the plant will not be able to make enough food and it will become sick.
